mapper.select: select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_date, Q_CONFIRM, m_no, p_no, q_name, rnum from (select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_date, Q_CONFIRM, m_no, p_no, q_name, rownum as rnum from (select q1.q_no, q_title, q_content, to_char(q_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as q_date, Q_CONFIRM, m_no, p_no, q_name, rownum as rnum from qna q1 inner join (select q_no from qna) q2 on q1.q_no = q2.q_no order by q_no desc) where rownum <= #{end_data}) where rnum >= #{start_data}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(q_no, q_title, q_content, q_pwd, p_no, m_no) values(QNA_seq.nextval, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, #{q_pwd}, #{p_no}, #{m_no})
mapper.update: update qna set q_confirm = 0 where m_no = #{m_no}
update qna set q_name = ((select m_id from member where m_no = #{m_no}))
mapper.select: select nvl((select 1 from qna where q_no=#{q_no} and q_pwd=#{q_pwd}), 0)as state from dual
